com.mobius.vdrapi.callbacks
Interface IHoldStatusMessage

public interface IHoldStatusMessage

A class implements IHoldStatusMessage to indicate that it can provide a status message - namely, a string value describing the current state of the operation being performed.

Method Summary
 String getStatusMessage()
          Returns the status message value that this object is holding.
 void setStatusMessage(String message)
          Sets the status message that this object is holding.
